faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What videos does MediaSum.AI work with?
faq.a1: We support most popular video platforms like YouTube, Vimeo, Facebook, and many others. You can also upload your own videos in many common formats.
faq.a2: Our AI algorithm has been trained on millions of videos to ensure high accuracy. However, summary quality may depend on audio quality and content complexity.
faq.a3: Currently, we support English, Vietnamese, and over 20 other common languages. We are continuously expanding our language support capabilities.
faq.a4: We take your privacy seriously. All videos and summaries are encrypted and only accessible by you. We don't store your video content longer than necessary to create the summary.
